title: D3  (OOL and OPL Experience) AD LF OOL TEAM
body:
D3 AD Main since season 3 here. Looking for a team for OOL.
I have past OOL and OPL experience. Was Sub AD for Sudden Fear.
Doesn't matter jack but some fun facts:

5th Vayne in OCE
26th Lucian OCE
311th Vayne World

Hit me up peeps, IGN: Hazer
